overview: Jewels are missing. Detectives are baffled. Chloe is horny. Can Chloe beat the rap, or is she going go down? The town's richest woman has been robbed. The police have their main suspect, horny Chloe. Through a series of flashbacks she recounts the people who may have been involved. Is it the rich woman's cheating husband? Is the town whore? Can Chloe find an alibi, or can she persuade the detectives to look elsewhere? Chi Chi LaRue presents a sexy who-dun-it that explores the criminal mind and what people will do to get off!
title: In Defense
